Package playn.core.gl

Interface Summary
GL20 Platform-independent interface and values for OpenGL ES 2.0, based on the official JOGL GL2ES2 interface.
GLPattern Provide access to the texture that implements a pattern in GL.
GLShader Defines the interface to shaders used by the GL core.
GLShader.Color Defines the interface to the color shader.
GLShader.Texture Defines the interface to the texture shader.
 

Class Summary
CanvasLayerGL A temporary CanvasLayer implementation used until we eliminate the whole business.
GLContext  
GLUtil  
GraphicsGL Handles the common implementation of Graphics for GL backends.
GroupLayerGL  
ImageGL  
ImageLayerGL  
ImageRegionGL  
ImmediateLayerGL  
ImmediateLayerGL.Clipped  
IndexedTrisShader A GLShader implementation that decomposes quads into indexed triangles.
LayerGL  
SurfaceGL  
SurfaceLayerGL
